thread.title: Frank Patterson
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Frank Patterson

author: Frank Patterson
title: Frank Patterson
text: When we arrived , Ben came over to say hello. We told him what we were looking for and we would stop over and see him when we were ready. We had a complicated purchase because we only needed certain pieces. But when we figured out those pieces and asked for his input ... he was invaluable. He didn't bother us on everything we looked at. He simply made himself available to us when we needed him. When the purchase happened he was quick and got us on our way. Terrific sales person. Terrific furniture and reasonably priced! Hugs deals everywhere in the store!
